ActivityMetadata.Name: PD List services
ActivityMetadata.Label: PD List services
ActivityMetadata.Description:
List existing Services.
A service may represent an application, component, or team you wish to open incidents against.
For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#services)
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# PagerDuty

List services

List existing Services. A service may represent an application, component, or team you wish to open incidents against. For more information see the [API Concepts Document](../../docs/CONCEPTS.md#services)

Method: Get

OperationID: listServices

EndPoint:

/services
